entry.title: FAIL WITH CONSEQUENCE (TWAT)
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,314Chapters: 4/12Kudos: 68

Summary: When Stiles undoes Scott’s werewolf bite, everything changes. Powerless and immune to the supernatural, Scott falls from the center to the fringe watching as Stiles becomes something… More. More than the boy who used to orbit someone else’s story, stepping into a role no one had a name for. Was it truly the path to becoming a True Alpha that made Scott a hero or had seeing himself as Beacon Hills paragon only amplified the illusion? *inspired by failcat's AU twitter post wherein Scott becomes human again learns he's a twat but really he learns nothing and continues to be a twat.
